description: Schema that describes the main wind pressure for a builing face
title: MainWindPressure

WallPressureCoefficient_Cp.description: Wall pressure coefficient per Fig 27.3-1 ASCE7-16

InternalPressureCoefficient_Cpi.description: Internal pressure coefficient per Table 26.13-1 ASCE7-16

DesignPressure_psi.description: The MWFRS design pressure to use for this face of the building (psf)
